duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a coding resource for internal departments within Commercial Risk Adjustment, Medicare Advantage Risk Adjustment, Commercial IVA, and Medicare RADV.
Responsible for coding patient charts to capture hierarchical chronic conditions and assigning appropriate diagnosis codes from medical records within coding guidelines.
Maintain a quality standard of averaging 95% on monthly quality audit scores.
Meet production expectations of 4 charts per hour on average.
100% remote work if Onshore, ability to go onsite to the office in Manila, Philippines if Offshore.

education_certification.credential: Active coding certification (AHIMA, CCS-P, CCS, AAPC, CPC, CPC-A, CPC-P, CRC)
